name: hivcustom
title: Extended Codes CodeSystem
description: Set of codes representing all concepts used in the implementation guide

concept.definition: Hepatitis C Test - Hepatitis C antibody

concept.display: Hepatitis C antibody; confirmatory test (eg, immunoblot)
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Test - Hepatitis C antibody; confirmatory test (eg, immunoblot)

concept.display: Infectious agent detection by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); hepatitis C, direct probe technique
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Test - Infectious agent detection by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); hepatitis C, direct probe technique

concept.display: Infectious agent detection by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); hepatitis C, amplified probe technique, includes reverse transcription when performed

concept.display: Infectious agent detection by nucleic acid (DNA or RNA); hepatitis C, quantification, includes reverse transcription when performed

concept.display: RNA testing for Hepatitis C documented as performed within 6 months prior to initiation of antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP-C)

concept.display: Hepatitis C quantitative RNA testing documented as performed at 12 weeks from initiation of antiviral treatment (HEP-C)
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Hepatitis C quantitative RNA testing documented as performed at 12 weeks from initiation of antiviral treatment (HEP-C)

concept.display: Ribonucleic acid (RNA) testing for Hepatitis C viremia ordered or results documented (HEP C)
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Ribonucleic acid (RNA) testing for Hepatitis C viremia ordered or results documented (HEP C)

concept.display: Hepatitis C genotype testing documented as performed prior to initiation of antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP C)
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Hepatitis C genotype testing documented as performed prior to initiation of antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP C)

concept.display: Hepatitis C screening documented as performed (HIV)
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Hepatitis C screening documented as performed (HIV)

concept.display: Patient receiving antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP-C)
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Patient receiving antiviral treatment for Hepatitis C (HEP-C)

concept.display: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

concept.display: Infectious disease, chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, six biochemical assays (ALT, A2-macroglobulin, apolipoprotein A-1, total bilirubin, GGT, and haptoglobin) utilizing serum, prognostic algorithm reported as scores for fibrosis and necroinflammatory activity in liver
concept.definition: Hepatitis C Procedures - Infectious disease, chronic hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, six biochemical assays (ALT, A2-macroglobulin, apolipoprotein A-1, total bilirubin, GGT, and haptoglobin) utilizing serum, prognostic algorithm reported as scores for fibrosis and necroinflammatory activity in liver
